newsitem.title: USA: FINAL PRICING -- Kentucky Higher Education.
newsitem.headline: FINAL PRICING -- Kentucky Higher Education.

text.p: KENTUCKY HIGHER EDUCATION STUDENT LOAN CORPORATION
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES A
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES B
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES C
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES D
THIS ISSUE WILL BE IN BOOK ENTRY FORM THROUGH THE FACILITIES OF DTC
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES A
ALL BONDS ARE PRICED AT PAR.
CALL FEATURES: Not Subject to Optional Call
Subject to Excess Revenue Call Par
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES B
ALL BONDS ARE PRICED AT PAR.
CALL FEATURES: Not Subject to Optional Call
Subject to Excess Revenue Call Par
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES C
ALL BONDS ARE PRICED AT PAR.
CALL FEATURES: Not Subject to Optional Call
Subject to Excess Revenue Call Par
INSURED STUDENT LOAN REVENUE BONDS, 1997 SERIES D
ALL BONDS ARE PRICED AT PAR.
CALL FEATURES: Not Subject ot Optional Call
Subject to Excess Revenue Call Par
The compliance addendum MSRB Rule G-11 will apply.
The award was received today Friday, May 9, 1997.
Delivery is firm for May 15, 1997 (for series: A, B)
firm for September 4, 1997 (for series: C, D)
This issue is book entry through DTC.
